aws::graph::propositions: # Meteorological Information and Flight Plan Details
The conditions at the accident site were Visual Meteorological Conditions (VMC).
The lowest cloud condition at the accident site was clear.
The wind direction at the accident site was 3 degrees.
The departure point was Fair Grove, Missouri (MO68).
Fair Grove is located in Missouri.
MO68 is the identifier for the airport in Fair Grove, Missouri.
The destination was Bolivar, Missouri (M17).
Bolivar is located in Missouri.
M17 is the identifier for the airport in Bolivar, Missouri.
The departure time was 12:40 Local.
The condition of light during the accident was day.
The visibility at the accident site was 10 miles.
The temperature at the accident site was 18 degrees Celsius.
The type of flight plan filed was unknown.
The type of clearance was unknown.
No observation facility was reported.
No observation time was reported.
No ceiling information was reported.
No wind speed or gusts were reported.
No altimeter setting was reported.
No precipitation or obscuration was reported.
No distance from accident site was reported.
No direction from accident site was reported.
No runway visual range visibility was reported.
No turbulence type forecast or actual was reported.
No turbulence severity forecast or actual was reported.
No type of airspace was reported.
